Generation III.Ruby: A legend states that Jirachi will make true any wish that is written on notes attached to its head when it awakens. If this Pok é mon senses danger, it will fight without awakening.
Generation III.Sapphire: Jirachi will awaken from its sleep of a thousand years if you sing to it in a voice of purity. It is said to make true any wish that people desire.
Generation III.Emerald: Jirachi is said to make wishes come true. While it sleeps, a tough crystalline shell envelops the body to protect it from enemies.
Generation III.FireRed: It is said to make any wish come true. It is awake for only seven days out of a thousand years.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It is said to make any wish come true. It is awake for only seven days out of a thousand years.

Generation VIII.Sword: Once every 1,000 years, the singing of a pure voice will rouse this Pokémon from its near-perpetual slumber. It wakes for only seven days. *
Generation VIII.Shield: It's believed that when this Pokémon wakes from its 1,000-year slumber, it will grant any wishes written on the notes attached to its head. *
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It is said to wake up for just seven days every 1,000 years and use its power to grant any wish.
